item.title: Boot Process
item.description: In this post we will take about the boot process of linux OS Stages There are 4 Stages and they are: The Firmware Phase (BIOS and UEFI integrity check) (POST) The Bootloader Phase The Kernel Phase (initialization) Starting Systemd, the parent of all processes Firmware Phase The firmware is the BIOS (Basic Input/Output System) or the UEFI (Unified Extensible Firmware Interface) code that is stored in flash memory on the mother board.
